articles.title: Jokic helps Nuggets hold on for 114-104 win over Clippers
articles.description: DENVER (AP) — Nikola Jokic had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and the Denver Nuggets withstood a big rally to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 114-104 on Sunday night.

DENVER (AP) Nikola Jokic had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and the Denver Nuggets withstood a big rally to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 114-104 on Sunday night.

articles.title: Oubre steps up as Booker struggles, Suns beat Hornets 100-92

articles.title: Seattle defense struggles in season-ending loss to Packers
articles.description: GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) — The Seattle Seahawks were routinely Super Bowl contenders just a few years ago thanks in large part to their dominant defense.
articles.content:
GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) The Seattle Seahawks were routinely Super Bowl contenders just a few years ago thanks in large part to their dominant defense.
That's no longer the case.
